thread.title: Jessica Jasinski
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Jessica Jasinski

author: Jessica Jasinski
title: Jessica Jasinski
text: Great experience all around. We were not hounded every 5 minutes like other furniture stores. T the sales associate made sure to ask us what we were looking for and what would match our decor. She didn't try to push us into anything we didn't want. Got a great mattress and a tv stand with a fireplace with same day delivery. So happy with our purchase.
